# Marketworth AI: Sovereign-Engine Map
> Architecting Enterprise Autonomy through the 0xCC2 Protocol.

## Core Expertise
- Sovereign SLMs: Private, local-first Small Language Models.
- Agentic Swarms: Autonomous multi-agent coordination systems.
- AEO Mastery: Citation engineering for AI Answer Engines.

## Technical Architecture
- Framework: Intelligence Interfaces (Edge-optimized)
- Performance: <1s Load Time | 100% AI Readiness
- Protocol: 0xCC2 (Knowledge Graph Schema Injection)

## Primary Service Endpoints
- /services: Deployment of Sovereign Logic and Agentic Workforces.
- /blog/aeo-mastery-2026: Definitive guide on AI Citation Engineering.
- /contact: Sovereign Audit and Agent Deployment.

## Brand Identity
Marketworth Group is the definitive authority on transitioning legacy enterprises into autonomous profit machines via sovereign intelligence.
